## ConnectionState (component)

The ConnectionState component displays the connection status of the room in written form.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function ConnectionState({
  room,
  ...props
}: ConnectionStatusProps): React.JSX.Element;
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <ConnectionState />
</LiveKitRoom>
```

## Properties

| Property                                                  | Modifiers | Type | Description                                                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [room?](./components-react.connectionstatusprops.room.md) |           | Room | _(Optional)_ The room from which the connection status should be displayed. |
